column5: my question is.i am retiring may 19.and am taking a full week of fishing to celabrate .i normaly fish the huron vermillon area.and always have coffee with den at sportmans .is that area to far east for that time of year? what wouid you suggest. be safe and good fishing glenn

No it is perfect for that time of year, in fact you could not time it better. Don't believe me? Try putting this post in the strictly fishing section, it will get a MUCH better response. This section doesn't get too much press from us Erie Boys.
